alfonse6.name: Alfonse
alfonse6.title: Opening Miracle
alfonse6.description: A kind and serious prince of Askr who is eager to maintain peace. He fights to save the world with power entrusted to him by Askr, the god of openness.

Castle Hall: To the creator, I'm sure Ragnarök is like a game...
Dangerous battles lie ahead of us. Please, you must remain by my side, [S].
Nifl and Múspell have also entrusted their worlds to Heroes. If we work together, then perhaps it is possible...
I will fulfill the duty that has been entrusted to me by Askr, the Divine Dragon. For the sake of the realms.
The future has been entrusted to me by Divine Dragon Askr. I shall cut a path to it... Now let's save the world.
Visit: "How is the battle progressing for you? Tell me if you need anything." That is from [F].
Level: I will not yield, no matter what kind of annihilation I face!
Yet, the battle continues... I shall not be satisfied by this.
This is no good. This will not be enough to save everyone!
Summon: Ragnarök consists of three stages of annihilation... Worry not. I will not lose, so long as you are with me.
Learn Skill: I shall overcome adversity and the twilight, for the sake of Askr's future.
Confession:
There are three stages set to take place, one after another...
The winter of annihilation, the wolf of annihilation, and the sword of annihilation...
I would be lying if I said I was certain. I question how we can win. How can we prevent the most loss?
Yet, I have no intention of fleeing. I will fight for the Divine Dragon Askr and the people of this world.
I feel as though I can overcome any hardship and open a path to the future, as long as you are by my side.
Thank you for sticking with me thus far. Let us survive this together, no matter what, [S].
Status: This power was entrusted to me by the Divine Dragon Askr and...by our world...
Hm? You never change, do you?
For the sake of all who live in the nine realms, we cannot fail.
Quite some time has passed since we first met, hasn't it?
You have remained by my side for so long now... I am truly grateful.
I shall shoulder the power entrusted to me and the responsibility it entails. I will bear all of it.
I have not forgotten my promise to you. When we finally achieve peace, I shall open the way and return you to the world you call home...

ignatz2.name: Ignatz
ignatz2.title: Worldly Artist
ignatz2.description: A student of the Golden Deer House who was raised in a merchant family. As their second son, he was enrolled in the Officers Academy. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Castle Hall: Reading books from different regions makes me feel like I've visited those places. Aren't stories wonderful?

I'm from a merchant family employed by nobles. I'm not inheriting the business. My brother is.
My father said that I'm to become a knight.
The professor is inspiring. In fact, I know a lot of people who are. I'll do my best to keep up.
I haven't had many chances to travel, so I'm kind of excited.
Oh... I had a little extra time, so I'm using it to paint some landscapes. I like to paint. It's relaxing.
Visit: My name is Ignatz. Correct me if I'm wrong, but I believe this castle is [S]'s.
Level: I can get things done when I put my mind to it, you know!
Know that there are no hard feelings.
Summon: I'm Ignatz Victor. My parents are Alliance merchants. I look forward to learning from you.
Learn Skill: I feel like I'm starting to understand some things!
Confession:
Goddess... Ah!
Oh, it's you. You should have said something. Sorry I made you wait for me, [S].
I actually wasn't praying. I was just wondering what the goddess of our world looks like.
When she descended to the land in the past, they say she charmed the people all over Fódlan.
Even now, she watches over us from the heavens. I believe she must be very beautiful.
It is said that one day she will be resurrected in Fódlan. I would very much like to witness that.
Special: Let me paint you a picture!
Status: I'm Ignatz Victor. My parents are Alliance merchants.
Ah! Oh no, my glasses! Where are my glasses?!
I can't wait to see what kinds of flowers bloom in this world.
Painting is a hobby of mine. Want me to do your portrait?
Askr is quite a picturesque place.
There are so many impressive figures here. I'll try my best to measure up.
I may not look it, but I can handle myself pretty well. I'll prove it to you.

lorenz2.name: Lorenz
lorenz2.title: Red-Rose Noble
lorenz2.description: A student of the Golden Deer House who stands out as the arrogant heir to a well-known noble house. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Castle Hall: It is the duty of every Fódlan noble to demonstrate piety toward Seiros.

Golden Deer are sacred creatures said to have protected Leicester since time immemorial.
Naturally, I am a member of the Golden Deer House.
I hope you are being mindful of your health? They say it is important to rest your mind and body.
The Church of Seiros considers the Goddess's Rite of Rebirth to be the most significant ritual.
Truthfully, I am not a devout believer, but, as heir of Gloucester territory, I must not neglect my prayers.
Visit:
I presume you are the one called [S], yes?
Take a look at what I was asked to give you by [F].
Level: A trivial victory! My best is still far ahead of me.
You are outclassed! You cannot hope to best a noble like me.
I thought I gave it my all!
Summon: I am Lorenz Hellman Gloucester. As heir to the noble House Gloucester, I shall demonstrate battle with pride.
Confession:
Women within the castle are avoiding me? Are you certain? Alas, I think I know why they might be hesitant.
After all, I am heir to the noble House Gloucester. My future wife must join a noble society, even if she dislikes it.
It is a world full of annoying decorum and customs. Someone raised as a commoner would see it as strict.
But she cannot be just for show. We must have a relationship built upon respect and support of one another.
The lady I wed must be well-bred, refined, and intelligent. No wonder women are wary of my advances.
With that in mind, I intend to seek out a partner most suited to me in this land, and strive to act with sincerity.
Special: Don't you know who I am?
Status: My name is Lorenz Hellman Gloucester. You will want to remember it.
I beg your pardon? It would benefit you to pay more attention to the way you carry yourself in the presence of nobility.
It is the duty of the nobility to protect the commonfolk. In return, the commoner need only show deference and respect.
As I'm sure you know, the future of all Fódlan is my responsibility!
If you are looking for tea, Ferdinand's impeccable taste is absolutely worth your attention. Assuming I am not available, of course.
To find the analogue of your beauty in nature, I can turn only to the lily. Only that flower is so sweet and... Ah! How much of that did you hear?
I know my presence can be intimidating, but there is no need to be nervous. If I did not wish to spend time with you, I would not.

lysithea5.name: Lysithea
lysithea5.title: Duality Prodigy
lysithea5.description: Daughter of Count Ordelia and noble of the Leicester Alliance. With two Crests residing within her, she challenges the very principles of the universe. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Castle Hall: My research is a battle with the time I have left. So much so that I wish I didn't have to sleep.

Techniques and experiments that utilize blood... The Crests infused in me conflict with the laws of nature.
They continue to eat away at my life...
Studying has never been distressing to me. To the contrary, what is the point of life without learning?
No one in this world is born with the Crests I know from mine? I see... There is so much to contemplate.
I feel as though you carry yourself in a way that resembles the professor, [S].
Visit: I am Lysithea von Ordelia. I have learned all about another world while staying at [F]'s.
Level: One day, I shall describe the rules of nature that govern this world in precise detail. I am not there yet...
I crushed the enemy's formation. Let us strike again before they have a moment to counterattack.
I shall continue to force myself to grow, even if it means giving up on the idea of a normal life.
Summon: I am Lysithea von Ordelia. Just to let you know, I have no time to waste.
Learn Skill: I will prove that you chose correctly.
Confession:
Do you have some business with me, [S]?
Wait! Don't answer that. I know... You've come to recruit me for my brilliant mind. Isn't that right?
I have learned some fascinating things here. Such as, people in this world are never endowed with Crests.
This is strong ground on which to base my analysis of the origin and influence of Crests.
Now, if I can just elucidate how they function...
But I have no time for that. The magic users who made my body this way sentenced me to a short life.
So...if you help me with my research, I will agree to remain here.
Status: This tome is Suttungr's Mystery. It's a Hero's Relic.
Ahh! Ahem... If you were trying to surprise me, you have a lot to learn. I don't scare so easily anymore.
Look at me now. I've gotten so much more sophisticated in the last five years, wouldn't you say?
We must overthrow the Empire. I will not permit their meddling any longer!
There's a mysterious power aiding the Empire... If we could just discover its true identity...
I chose my path. I must press on. That's all anyone can do, really.
You look tired. How about we have some sweets while enjoying tea?

raphael2.name: Raphael
raphael2.title: Beast of Leicester
raphael2.description: A student of the Golden Deer House whose stomach matches his large physique. He is not one to neglect to train his muscles. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Castle Hall: Muscles beat Crests and Heroes' Relics and delicious food— Wait, not delicious food. That wins out here!

Don't you think everyone's making too big a fuss over these Crests or Heroes' Relics or whatever they are?
Are they really that important?
Do you know what's on the menu tonight? Come on, tell me!
Ugh. I really need to eat. I can't hold out until the next meal!
Why can't the dining hall stay open all the time? My muscles need more food if I'm gonna get stronger!
Visit: Wanna see my muscles? I've trained 'em up so good and even got praised by [F]for 'em!
Level: Look at my muscles! I have my own way of training them.
Plenty more where that came from.
Summon: Nice to meet you! I'm Raphael Kirsten. Who are you?
Confession:
*sniffle* *sniffle* Oh! I didn't see you there, [S]!
I was just thinking about my little sis. She lives with my grandpa now...
See, our parents were merchants, but they died in an accident, and I'm not smart enough for a...thinking job.
So I sold all our valuables and used the money to pay my way into the academy... And my sis, well...
She wants what's best for me, but she's the smart one in the family! She's the one that should be here!
But she won't ask me for anything... *sob* I...I'm gonna train my muscles so much that I become unbeatable!
Status: I'm Raphael Kirsten. So...are you strong? Let's see those muscles!
Whoa there! You lookin' for a fight?
There are so many strong Heroes around here. One of 'ems gotta have tips for how I can get bigger muscles!
I can't grow if I can't eat!
There's gonna be a feast to welcome all the new Heroes, right? Right?
My hometown is a real calm, peaceful place... It'd be nice to go back every now and then.
Let's keep fighting! And winning!
